name: Boomerang - Amazing Fly!
description:
Let's fly the boomerang far!
Tap the screen at the timing when you come back to yourself!
If the timing is perfect, you can fly Boomerang farther.

Game over when the timing shifts!
A boomerang attacks you.

If you can successfully fly a boomerang until the end,
Something fun might happen.
Please aim clearly and skip boomerang well!
